greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of maximal vertex-independent sets in the hypergraph with nodes V = {1, 2, ..., n} and "edges" consisting of the triples (X,Y,Z) with X<Y<Z and X+Y=Z.
comment: A subset S of V is vertex-independent if there is no edge (X,Y,Z) with X, Y, Z all in S.
xref: J. Sedlacek, On a set system, Annals New York Acad. Sci., 175 (No. 1, 1970), 329-330.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 10 2010
